item.title: LIVE NOT BY LIES: The Feds ARE the TRUE Bullies, IVF IS NOT Pro-Life ft. Laura Klassen & Jon Speed, and the Lockdowns DID Far More Harm Than Good [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 13, 2023
LIVE NOT BY LIES, FRIENDS! On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty take a look at the standoff between Meta (Facebook and Instagram) and the Canadian Federal Government, the practice of IVF, and the increasingly more evident reality that lockdowns did much more harm than good.

MUST READS:  "Live Not By Lies" by ALEXANDER SOLZHENITSYN: https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/pdf/10.1080/03064220408537357;
"Live Not by Lies: A Manual for Christian Dissidents" | Rod Dreher: https://www.amazon.com/Live-Not-Lies-Christian-Dissidents-ebook/dp/B088F2ZYTV;

[Segment 1] -  Liberal Government Pulls Meta Advertising Funds:
"Rodriguez Pulls Government Ads" | True North Canada: https://tnc.news/2023/07/05/rodriguez-pulls-government-ads;

[Segment 2] -  Interview ft. Laura Klassen & Jon Speed:
MUST WATCH: "Build-a-Baby" | Choice42: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e6VYza7JE6s&embeds_referring_euri=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.choice42.com%2F&feature=emb_imp_woyt;
LOOR.TV: https://www.loor.tv;
Choice42: https://www.choice42.com;

[Segment 3] -  Lockdowns Did MORE HARM THAN GOOD:
"Nudge Unit Chief Says UK Will Obey Future Lockdowns, Citizens Have Learnt the Behaviour" | Breitbart: https://www.breitbart.com/europe/2023/07/06/nudge-unit-chief-says-uk-will-obey-future-lockdowns-citizens-have-learnt-the-behaviour;
"Lockdowns: The Self-Inflicted Disaster" | City Journal: https://www.city-journal.org/article/lockdowns-the-self-inflicted-disaster#disqus_thread;

item.title: SCOTUS Deals Massive Blow to Racist Leftists While Canadian Liberals Whine & RANK Elitist Hypocrisy [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 11, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty explored a recent smorgasbord of news stories that highlight massive elitist hypocrisy that is making life worse for everyone else, and the US Supreme Court deals a massive blow to Leftist racism. Andrew is joined by the Wilkins family to talk about their daughter's recent suspension for wearing a plain shirt that states a benign biological fact.

[Segment 1] -  News Buffet:
1. Canada's unemployment rate rises:
"Canada Loses 17,000 Jobs, Unemployment Rate Rises" | Financial Post: https://financialpost.com/news/economy/canada-loses-17000-jobs-unemployment-rate-rises#Echobox=1686315319;
2. Toronto Mayor wants to ban two-stroke engines:
"Under Chow, Expect Council to Focus on Everything but You" | Toronto Sun: https://torontosun.com/opinion/columnists/under-chow-expect-council-to-focus-on-everything-but-you#Echobox=1688403066;
3. Cruise ships in Europe emit more toxic fumes than all cars in Europe:
"Carnival Cruise Ship Emits More Toxic Fumes Than All of Europe's Cars, Study Finds" | Gulf Insider: https://www.gulf-insider.com/carnival-cruise-ship-emits-more-toxic-fumes-than-all-of-europes-cars-study-finds;
4. Climate scientists say air conditioning is not the answer:
"Heat wave: Canadian households without air conditioning are suffering, and climate change will make it worse" | Global News: https://globalnews.ca/news/9817907/heat-wave-canadian-households-air-conditioning-climate-change;
5. Atlantic Provinces Feeling the Climate Crunch:
"Double whammy of new climate policies in Atlantic Canada fuels political battle" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/politics/double-whammy-of-new-climate-policies-in-atlantic-canada-fuel-political-battle#Echobox=1688088503;
6. FDA approves human trials for Neuralink chip:
"FDA Approves First Human Trials for Elon Musk's Brain Chip Company Neuralink" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/fda-approves-first-human-trials-for-elon-musks-brain-chip-company-neuralink;

[Segment 2] -  Interview w/ Wilkins Family:

[Segment 3] -  SCOTUS DESTROYS Affirmative Actions and Lefties Melt:
Biden v. Nebraska: https://www.supremecourt.gov/opinions/22pdf/22-506_nmip.pdf;
"US Supreme Court Backs Affirmative Action in Harvard, UNC Ruling" | The Guardian: https://www.theguardian.com/law/2023/jun/29/us-supreme-court-affirmative-action-harvard-unc-ruling;
"MP Bob Rae Praises Affirmative Action" | True North: https://tnc.news/2023/07/05/rae-praises-affirmative-action;
OCASI Statement on Tax Credit to Hire Immigrants | Ontario Council of Agencies Serving Immigrants: https://ocasi.org/ocasi-statement-tax-credit-hire-immigrants;

item.title: NEVER FORGET!: The True LONG COVID - Tyranny, Coverups & Gaslighting [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ July 06, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty bring receipts on the continued COVID coverup and the horrible effects of government and MSM media lies. WE MUST NOT FORGET; WE MUST PURSUE JUSTICE!

DID YOU PARTICIPATE IN LCC'S NEWEST INITIATIVE, "TRUE READINGS FROM TRUE ROYALTY"?  
SEND US YOUR STORIES, PICTURES, AND VIDEOS: churches@libertycoalitioncanada.com;

[Segment 1] -  More information coming out regarding the COVID jab (18:35-34:25):
"Very Bad News for 'Super Vax' People: Facts Matter" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/very-bad-news-for-super-vax-people-facts-matter_5351356.html;
CDC Press Release: "CDC Establishes the First National Vaccine Injury Surveillance and Compensation Program" | Centers for Disease Control and Prevention: https://www.cdc.gov/media/releases/2023/s0526-eis.html;
"CDC Drops Bombshell on the Vaccinated: Facts Matter" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/cdc-drops-bombshell-on-the-vaccinated-facts-matter_5304105.html;
"Peer-Reviewed Study: Vaccinated Individuals Account for Majority of New COVID-19 Cases" | MDPI: https://www.mdpi.com/2076-393X/11/5/991;
"Basketball Player Dies From Heart Attack After Blaming Heart Condition on Vaccine" | Fox Sports: https://www.foxsports.com.au/basketball/basketball-player-dies-from-heart-attack-after-blaming-heart-condition-on-vaccine/news-story/bfb938d5645fe7d6a1153ce6c0e64a53;

[Segment 2] -  More information coming out about lies from the health establishment (35:30-01:02:12):
"Fauci, NIH, EcoHealth Alliance, and Peter Daszak's Involvement in Gain-of-Function Research and Wuhan COVID-19" | Daily Caller: https://dailycaller.com/2021/11/03/fauci-nih-ecohealth-peter-daszak-gain-of-function-wuhan-covid-19;
Tweet by Kevin Bass: https://twitter.com/kevinnbass/status/1675915866398130176;
"CDC's Walenksy Knew Vaccines Didn't Stop Infections in January 2021 but Still Told Americans Vaccinated People Do Not Carry the Virus, Email Reveals" | The Daily Sceptic: https://dailysceptic.org/2023/06/22/cdcs-walenksy-knew-vaccines-didnt-stop-infections-in-january-2021-but-still-told-americans-vaccinated-people-do-not-carry-the-virus-email-reveals;
Tweet by Kevin Bass: https://twitter.com/kevinnbass/status/1670986558898569217;

Our Conversation with Barter It Founder John Porter (48:14-01:10:45): https://rumble.com/v2jmhi8-the-great-economic-reset-cbdc-and-the-move-toward-a-cashless-society-ft.-jo.html; 

[Segment 3] - Mailbag/Conclusion (01:06:00- END)
